mapper.select: SELECT MBR_ID , MBR_NM , PWD , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , USE_YN , TO_CHAR(LST_LGN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LST_LGN_DT , LST_LGN_IP , LGN_TRY_CNT , LGN_BLCK_YN , TO_CHAR(LST_LGN_FAIL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LST_LGN_FAIL_DT , PWD_SALT , TO_CHAR(PWD_CHNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PWD_CHNG_DT , ADM_YN FROM MBR WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId} AND PWD = #{pwd}
